frame.name: Importance
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Factor</fen> affects the outcome of an <fen>Undertaking</fen>, which can be a goal-oriented activity or the maintenance of a desirable state, the work in a <fen>Field</fen>, or something portrayed as affecting an <fen>Interested_party</fen>. A <fen>Reason</fen> may be given for the importance of the <fen>Factor</fen>. The <fen>Degree</fen> of importance may also be specified.
<ex>Temperature is the <fex name="Degree">most</fex> <t>critical</t> <fex name="Factor">factor</fex> <fex name="Undertaking">in successful storage</fex>.</ex> <ex> <fex name="Factor">Timing</fex> will be <t>critical</t>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Factor">Heathcliff</fex> <m>is</m> <fex name="Degree">more</fex> <t>important</t> <fex name="Interested_party">to me</fex> <fex name="Degree">than myself</fex> . </ex> <ex> <fex name="Factor">1992</fex> <m>was</m> <m>of</m> <fex name="Degree">great</fex> <t>importance</t> <fex name="Interested_party">to the business community</fex>. </ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Factor
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Factor</fen> is used for the concrete or abstract entity whose importance is assessed. <ex> <fex name="Factor">Being sure they are buying fresh food</fex> <m>is</m> <t>important</t> <fex name="Interested_party">to most people</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE marks expressions that indicate the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>. <ex> <fex name="Factor">1992</fex> <m>is</m> <m>of</m> <fex name="Degree">great</fex> <t>importance</t> <fex name="Interested_party">to the business community</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Undertaking
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Undertaking</fen> is a process or state or field of activity in which the <fen>Interested_party</fen> has a stake. <ex>Temperature is the <fex name="Degree">most</fex> <t>critical</t> <fex name="Factor">factor</fex> <fex name="Undertaking">in successful storage</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Explanation</fen> for which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>. <ex>It 's <t>critical</t> to get it right <fex name="Explanation">because there are situations where if you don't, they will withhold some commission.</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Interested_party
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Interested_party</fen> identifies the people who are affected by a particular <fen>Factor</fen>.
<ex> <fex name="Factor">Being sure they are buying fresh food</fex> <m>is</m> <t>important</t> <fex name="Interested_party">to most people</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Field
FE.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Factor</fen> may be generally important to the people or the activities in a field of endeavour.
<ex> <fex name="Factor">A successful GATT round</fex> <m>is</m> <t>important</t> <fex name="Field">for the world economy</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element is defined as the number of times an event occurs per some unit of time. A Frequency expression answers the question how often. </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: crucial.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: decisive or critical, especially in the success or failure of something

lexUnit.name: critical.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having a decisive importance in the success or failure of something.

lexUnit.name: key.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: of crucial importance

lexUnit.name: decisive.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: acting to settle an issue quickly and effectively

lexUnit.name: pivotal.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: of crucial or central importance

lexUnit.name: important.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: of great significance or value

lexUnit.name: significant.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: extensive or important enough to merit attention

lexUnit.name: importance.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the state or quality of being important

lexUnit.name: significance.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the quality of being significant; importance.

lexUnit.name: import.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: importance

lexUnit.name: major.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: important, serious, or significant.

lexUnit.name: instrumental.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: important or serving as a principle means in some undertaking.

lexUnit.name: vital.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: absolutely necessary; essential.

lexUnit.name: considerable.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having merit or distinction.

lexUnit.name: fundamental.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: of or serving as a foundation or core; of central importance.

lexUnit.name: main.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: chief in importance.

lexUnit.name: serious.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: significant or worrying in terms of danger or risk.

lexUnit.name: seriously.adv
lexUnit.definition: FN: to a grave degree.

lexUnit.name: acute.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: critically important

lexUnit.name: landmark.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: of pivotal or decisive importance

lexUnit.name: epic.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: impressive or major; hypothetically deserving of legendary status

lexUnit.name: count.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: be important

lexUnit.name: priority.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: An assertion of importance. Often preceded by an ordinal ranking, like "number one".
